greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square array T(n,k), n>=0, k>=0, read by antidiagonals, where T(n,k) = n! * Sum_{j=0..n} j^k/j!.
formula: T(0,k) = 0^k and T(n,k) = n^k + n * T(n-1,k) for n>0.
mathematica: T[n_, k_] := n! * Sum[If[j == k == 0, 1, j^k]/j!, {j, 0, n}]; Table[T[k, n-k], {n, 0, 9}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Amiram Eldar_, Apr 29 2021 *)
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Aug 14 2020
